content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-18.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-13.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) working with iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) working with iron ore
- Wooden Chests at positions (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5), and (-14.5, -47.5)

### Coal Storage and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), and (47.5, -80.5) containing coal and iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5) with waiting status for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when transferring items due to insufficient inventory
- Ensure you have sufficient items in your inventory before attempting to transfer them to another entity.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Check the supply chain to ensure that the source items are available and can be accessed by the inserter.

### Errors with full chests blocking mining operations
- Regularly check and empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining operations from halting due to full storage.

### Errors when refueling or clearing drop chests
- Verify the existence and contents of chests before attempting to refuel or clear them to avoid errors related to non-existent entities.
